resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>

    <entry>69617</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>

    <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112559</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112559</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112559</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Primer didaktičnih iger poslušanja</string>
            <string language="en">Didactic games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Didaktische Spiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux didactiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos didactic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi didattici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδακτικά παιχνίδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos didácticos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V seminarju so zbrane didaktične igre poslušanja, povzete po knjigi Z IGRO RAZVIJAMO KOMUNIKACIJSKE SPOSOBNOSTI OTROK, S. PEČJAK. Priložena je teudi tedenska priprava za OPB, 1. razred, z uporabljenimi igrami, s podrobno obrazložitvijo posameznih iger.</string>
            <string language="en">Description of different didactic games that can be used for drilling listening comprehension. (Games taken from \"Z igro razvijamo komunikacijske sposobnosti otrok\" by S. Pečjak).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">didaktična igra</string>
            <string language="en">didactic game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">poslušanje</string>
            <string language="en">listening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slušno razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung der unterschiedlichen didaktischen 
Spiele, die für die Bohrung des hörenden Erfassens benutzt werden 
können. (Spiele genommen vom \"Z igro razvijamo komunikacijske 
sposobnosti otrok \" von S. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description des différents jeux didactiques qui 
peuvent être utilisés pour forer la compréhension d'écoute. 
(jeux pris de l'otrok de sposobnosti de komunikacijske de 
razvijamo d'igro de \"Z \" par S. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição dos jogos didactic diferentes que 
podem ser usados perfurando a compreensão escutando. (jogos 
feitos exame do otrok do sposobnosti do komunikacijske do razvijamo do
igro do \"Z \" por S. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione dei giochi didattici differenti che 
possono essere usati per perforare la comprensione ascoltante. 
(giochi presi dal otrok di sposobnosti del komunikacijske di 
razvijamo di igro del \"Z \" da S. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή των διαφορετικών διδακτικών παιχνιδιών που 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για την κατανόηση ακούσματος 
διάτρυσης. (Παιχνίδια που λαμβάνονται από το sposobnosti 
otrok \ razvijamo igro \"Z komunikacijske" από το 
Θ*ς. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción de diversos juegos didácticos que se
pueden utilizar para perforar la comprensión que escucha. 
(juegos tomados de otrok del sposobnosti del komunikacijske del 
razvijamo del igro del \"Z \" por S. Pe?jak).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">didaktisches Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo didactic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco didattico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδακτικό παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el escuchar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
